summary: A film featuring performances of several stars of the Latin Jazz music scene.
cast: Arturo O'Farrill|Rolando Guerrero|Joe Gonzales|Jim Seeley|Matt Hilgenberg|Mike Mossman|Joe Owens|Peter Brainin|Mike Migliore|Marshall McDonald|Maximilian Schweiger|Richard Perry|Papo Vasquez|Jack Jeffers|Sam Burtis|Rick Stepton|Bebo Valdés|Cachao|Gato Barbieri|Michel Camilo|Paquito D'Rivera|Chano Domínguez|Eliane Elias|Jerry González|Chico O'Farrill|Tito Puente|Orlando 'Puntilla' Ríos|Carlos 'Patato' Valdés|Chucho Valdés
title: Calle 54
